63.eng-name: Merits of the Helpers in Madinah (Ansaar)

hadiths.text: Narrated Abu Musa:When the Prophet (ﷺ) arrived at Medina, he noticed that some people among the Jews used to respect Ashura' (i.e. 10th of Muharram) and fast on it. The Prophet (ﷺ) then said, "We have more right to observe fast on this day." and ordered that fasting should be observed on it

chapter.ara-name: باب إِتْيَانِ الْيَهُودِ النَّبِيَّ صلى الله عليه وسلم حِينَ قَدِمَ الْمَدِينَةَ
chapter.eng-name: The coming of the Jews to the Prophet (ﷺ) on his arrival at Al-Madina
